formwizard-dialog-label-cancel: Button label on dialog to cancel operation
formwizard-dialog-label-done: Button label on dialog to save operation (make changes)
formwizard-dialog-label-next: Button label on dialog to move between screens
special-formwizard-title: Title of the special page Special:FormWizardPage
formwizard-wrong-config-file-alert: Message shown when config file is wrong
formwizard-page-action-complete: Message shown to user while page action is complete
formwizard-no-subpage-name-alert: Message shown when subpage name is not provided
formwizard-page-edit-summary: Summary shown when a page has been edited. it takes parameter $1 - the form project in which the edit was made
